title: Professional light-blue hero background refresh (static asset + refined overlay)

requirements.summary: Refine the Hero/intro background treatment to better match the light-blue theme and improve professionalism while preserving existing hero content/layout and CTA scroll behaviors.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section background appearance is consistent with the site’s light-blue theme (no clashing tones) in both light and dark modes.
Hero headline, subheadline, and buttons maintain strong readability/contrast over the background at common viewport sizes.
No changes to hero CTA actions: “Schedule Consultation” still scrolls to the Contact section and “View Services” still scrolls to the Services section.
No changes to the overall section order or navigation behavior in the page.

file_operations.description: Improve the hero background treatment with a more formal light-blue aligned overlay/gradient (including light and dark mode variants) layered above the background image to ensure consistent contrast/readability; keep existing hero content structure and preserve current CTA click-to-scroll behavior. Continue using the shadcn-ui Button component for CTAs (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).

requirements.summary: Replace the current hero background image with a new subtle, corporate-style generated image and wire it as a static asset in the Hero section with an appropriate overlay.
acceptanceCriteria: A new generated background image is added under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used by the Hero section instead of the current image.
The new background image is visually subtle (not busy) and supports a formal/professional Chartered Accountant look.
The background image is responsive (covers the hero area without distortion) and does not introduce visible banding/artifacts behind overlay/gradient.
The previous hero image is no longer referenced by the Hero section component.

file_operations.description: Add the new generated hero background image asset as specified: frontend/public/assets/generated/ca-hero-bg-professional.dim_1600x900.png.

Update the Hero section to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/ca-hero-bg-professional.dim_1600x900.png instead of the previous image, ensure the background uses responsive cover behavior, and tune overlay opacity/gradient so the image remains subtle and the text stays readable in both light and dark modes. Ensure the old asset path frontend/public/assets/generated/ca-hero.dim_1600x900.png is no longer referenced. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
